snippet.title: Sword of the Necromancer: Resurrection - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Mark your calendars for January 23, 2025, and prepare to descend into the crypt of the Necromancer!

WISHLIST THE GAME ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2782880/Sword_of_the_Necromancer_Resurrection/

Help Tama to save Koko using the powers of the forbidden Sword of the Necromancer. Turn your foes into allies and reach the depths of the Necromancer's dungeon. Gain enough power to bring Koko back from the dead, no matter the cost. Now in 3D and with a renewed battle system!
